description: The scope of this contract includes the provision of all necessary labor, supervision, materials, and equipment to complete snow removal and ice control at the Joseph A. Ghiz Building at the agreed-upon specifications.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Snow Removal and Ice Control at Joseph A. Ghiz Building

#### Announcement Overview

**Title:** ED060-240994-Joseph A. Ghiz Building - Snow Removal and Ice Control
**Reference Number:** WS4251986776-Doc4252020698
**Publicaion Date:** October 12, 2023
**Closing Date:** October 30, 2023, 14:00:00

**Vendor Information**

* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:** Sonia Stockman (sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Scope of Work**

The contracting authority requires a supplier to provide snow removal and ice control services for the Joseph A. Ghiz Building located at 275 Pope Road, Summerside, Prince Edward Island. The services will be provided according to the plans and specifications provided.

**Selection Criteria**

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Eligibility and Languages**

Suppliers may submit their documents in either English or French. Bidder's may also request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.

**Attachments and Notice URL**

None

**Deadline and Services Delivery**

The request for proposal has expired. The services will be provided on an as needed basis until the contract end date, which is currently undetermined. The services delivery region is Prince Edward Island.

#### Tender Description in Detail

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a supplier to provide snow removal and ice control services for the Joseph A. Ghiz Building. The contracting authority requires the provision of snow removal and ice control services to complete the task according to the plans and specifications. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days.

**For More Information**

Visit this [notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17704336?extsite=MTc3MDQzMzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for additional information.

Let me know if you need any changes. Or perhaps you would like me to format the output differently?  I'd be happy to help!
